issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

fields.summary: DNS entry 'identity.<system.dns.dnsdomain>' doesn't resolve after upgrade

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

To implement the workaround suggested in EUCA-11525, it was observed that {{euserv-deregister-service}} wouldn't de-register services:
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euserv-deregister-service dns --region @localhost
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euserv-describe-services --region @localhost
SERVICE  autoscaling           API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.autoscaling     enabled
SERVICE  autoscalingbackend    eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  bootstrap             bootstrap        10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  cloudformation        API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.cloudformation  enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatch            API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.cloudwatch      enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatchbackend     eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  cluster               ds2              ds2-cc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  compute               API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.compute         enabled
SERVICE  dns                   API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.dns             enabled
SERVICE  euare                 API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.euare           enabled
SERVICE  eucalyptus            eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  identity              API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.identity        enabled
SERVICE  imaging               API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.imaging         enabled
SERVICE  imagingbackend        eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    notready
SERVICE  jetty                 eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  loadbalancing         API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.loadbalancing   enabled
SERVICE  loadbalancingbackend  eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  notifications         eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  objectstorage         API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.objectstorage   enabled
SERVICE  pollednotifications   eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  reporting             bootstrap        10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  simpleworkflow        API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.simpleworkflow  enabled
SERVICE  storage               ds2              ds2-sc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  tokens                API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.tokens          enabled
SERVICE  user-api              API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44                 enabled
SERVICE  walrusbackend         walrus           walrus-1                        enabled
{code}

*Workaround* 

In order to successfully, de-register/re-register a service, good 'ol {{euca_conf}} was used.
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euca_conf --deregister-service -H 10.111.1.44 -N API_10.111.1.44.dns -T dns
warning: euca_conf is deprecated
SERVICE	dns               	API_10.111.1.44	API_10.111.1.44.dns  	arn:euca:bootstrap:API_10.111.1.44:dns:API_10.111.1.44.dns/
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euca_conf --register-service -H 10.111.5.168 -N 10.111.5.168_dns -T dns
warning: euca_conf is deprecated; use ``euserv-register-service'' instead
Created new partition '10.111.5.168_dns'
SERVICE	dns               	10.111.5.168_dns	10.111.5.168_dns     	http://10.111.5.168:8773/services/Dns	arn:euca:bootstrap:10.111.5.168_dns:dns:10.111.5.168_dns/
ERROR	imagingbackend    	eucalyptus	10.111.5.168         	ImagingBackendServicePropertyBootstrapper.enable( ): returned false, terminating bootstrap for component: imagingbackend
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euserv-describe-services --region @localhost
SERVICE  autoscaling           API_10.111.1.44   API_10.111.1.44.autoscaling     enabled
SERVICE  autoscalingbackend    eucalyptus        10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  bootstrap             bootstrap         10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  cloudformation        API_10.111.1.44   API_10.111.1.44.cloudformation  enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatch            API_10.111.1.44   API_10.111.1.44.cloudwatch      enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatchbackend     eucalyptus        10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  cluster               ds2               ds2-cc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  compute               API_10.111.1.44   API_10.111.1.44.compute         enabled
SERVICE  dns                   10.111.5.168_dns  10.111.5.168_dns                enabled
SERVICE  euare                 API_10.111.1.44   API_10.111.1.44.euare           enabled
SERVICE  eucalyptus            eucalyptus        10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  identity              API_10.111.1.44   API_10.111.1.44.identity        enabled
SERVICE  imaging               API_10.111.1.44   API_10.111.1.44.imaging         enabled
SERVICE  imagingbackend        eucalyptus        10.111.5.168                    notready
SERVICE  jetty                 eucalyptus        10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  loadbalancing         API_10.111.1.44   API_10.111.1.44.loadbalancing   enabled
SERVICE  loadbalancingbackend  eucalyptus        10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  notifications         eucalyptus        10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  objectstorage         API_10.111.1.44   API_10.111.1.44.objectstorage   enabled
SERVICE  pollednotifications   eucalyptus        10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  reporting             bootstrap         10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  simpleworkflow        API_10.111.1.44   API_10.111.1.44.simpleworkflow  enabled
SERVICE  storage               ds2               ds2-sc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  tokens                API_10.111.1.44   API_10.111.1.44.tokens          enabled
SERVICE  user-api              API_10.111.1.44   API_10.111.1.44                 enabled
SERVICE  walrusbackend         walrus            walrus-1                        enabled
{code}

*Steps*

# Set up Eucalyptus 4.1 cloud with Eucalyptus DNS enabled - [hspencer-280|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint-4.1/280/]
# Upgraded cloud following [upgrade documentation|https://www.eucalyptus.com/docs/eucalyptus/4.1.2/index.html#install-guide/upgrade.html] (just replaced repo information to use packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/yum/tags/eucalyptus-devel and packages.release.eucalyptus-systems.com/yum/tags/euca2ools-devel)
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# eval `clcadmin-assume-system-credentials`
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euare-accountlist --region @localhost
eucalyptus	502181571134
(eucalyptus)imaging	000153229002
(eucalyptus)loadbalancing	000188098072
(eucalyptus)database	000600792605
(eucalyptus)cloudformation	534634454119
(eucalyptus)objectstorage	000895317970
(eucalyptus)aws-exec-read	916471105907
(eucalyptus)blockstorage	944183563848
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euca-version
euca2ools 3.3.0-pre1-19-g15b10eb (Yokohama)
eucalyptus 4.2.0
{code}
# Attempted to deregister DNS service:
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euserv-describe-services --region @localhost
SERVICE  autoscaling           API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.autoscaling     enabled
SERVICE  autoscalingbackend    eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  bootstrap             bootstrap        10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  cloudformation        API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.cloudformation  enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatch            API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.cloudwatch      enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatchbackend     eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  cluster               ds2              ds2-cc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  compute               API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.compute         enabled
SERVICE  dns                   eucalyptus       10.111.5.168_dns                enabled
SERVICE  euare                 API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.euare           enabled
SERVICE  eucalyptus            eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  imaging               API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.imaging         enabled
SERVICE  imagingbackend        eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    notready
SERVICE  jetty                 eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  loadbalancing         API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.loadbalancing   enabled
SERVICE  loadbalancingbackend  eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  notifications         eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  objectstorage         API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.objectstorage   enabled
SERVICE  pollednotifications   eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  reporting             bootstrap        10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  simpleworkflow        API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.simpleworkflow  enabled
SERVICE  storage               ds2              ds2-sc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  tokens                API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.tokens          enabled
SERVICE  user-api              API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44                 enabled
SERVICE  walrusbackend         walrus           walrus-1                        enabled

[root@g-26-03 ~]# euserv-deregister-service dns --region @localhost
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euserv-describe-services --region @localhost
SERVICE  autoscaling           API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.autoscaling     enabled
SERVICE  autoscalingbackend    eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  bootstrap             bootstrap        10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  cloudformation        API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.cloudformation  enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatch            API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.cloudwatch      enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatchbackend     eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  cluster               ds2              ds2-cc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  compute               API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.compute         enabled
SERVICE  dns                   eucalyptus       10.111.5.168_dns                enabled
SERVICE  euare                 API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.euare           enabled

fields.summary: euserv-deregister-service doesn't seem to work on upgraded clouds

comments.body: There is no service called "dns" so "euserv-deregister-service dns --region @localhost" does nothing. If you wanted to deregister the dns service named "API_10.111.1.44.dns" you would use "euserv-deregister-service API_10.111.1.44.dns --region @localhost".

[~sjones],

Ah ok.  I checked out the help from {{euserv-deregister-service}} and it wasn't that explicit as to what to actually use.  
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euserv-deregister-service --help
usage: euserv-deregister-service [-U URL] [--region USER@REGION] [-I KEY_ID]
                                 [-S KEY] [--security-token TOKEN] [--debug]
                                 [--debugger] [--version] [-h]
                                 SVCINSTANCE

De-register an instance of a service

positional arguments:
  SVCINSTANCE           name of the service instance to de-register

optional arguments:
  -U URL, --url URL     bootstrap service endpoint URL
  --region USER@REGION  region and/or user names to search when looking up
                        config file data
  -I KEY_ID, --access-key-id KEY_ID
  -S KEY, --secret-key KEY
  --security-token TOKEN
  --debug               show debugging output
  --debugger            launch interactive debugger on error
  --version             show the program's version and exit
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
{code}
Maybe we update SVCINSTANCE to SVCNAME?  This way, it would match the headers provided by {{euserv-describe-services}}:
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euserv-describe-services --show-headers --region euca-admin@future
SERVICE  TYPE                  ZONE             NAME                            STATE
SERVICE  autoscaling           API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.autoscaling     enabled
SERVICE  autoscalingbackend    eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  bootstrap             bootstrap        10.111.1.44                     enabled
SERVICE  cloudformation        API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.cloudformation  enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatch            API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.cloudwatch      enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatchbackend     eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  cluster               ds2              ds2-cc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  compute               API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.compute         enabled
SERVICE  dns                   API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.dns             enabled
SERVICE  dns                   eucalyptus       10.111.5.168_dns                enabled
SERVICE  euare                 API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.euare           enabled
SERVICE  eucalyptus            eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  identity              API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.identity        enabled
SERVICE  imaging               API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.imaging         enabled
SERVICE  imagingbackend        eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    disabled
SERVICE  loadbalancing         API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.loadbalancing   enabled
SERVICE  loadbalancingbackend  eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  objectstorage         API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.objectstorage   enabled
SERVICE  pollednotifications   eucalyptus       10.111.5.168                    enabled
SERVICE  reporting             bootstrap        10.111.1.44                     enabled
SERVICE  simpleworkflow        API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.simpleworkflow  enabled
SERVICE  storage               ds2              ds2-sc-1                        enabled
SERVICE  tokens                API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44.tokens          enabled
SERVICE  user-api              API_10.111.1.44  API_10.111.1.44                 enabled
SERVICE  walrusbackend         walrus           walrus-1                        enabled
{code}
The value used to identity the service does not have to be the NAME, in some cases the NAME is not unique so you can also use the ARN (--expert shows the ARN)
